roles.title: Senior Full-Stack Developer
roles.description: Leading development of enterprise SaaS products serving Fortune 500 clients. Architecting scalable solutions and mentoring junior developers.
achievements: Architected and delivered FinFlow platform processing $2B+ monthly transactions
Reduced API response times by 70% through database optimization and caching strategies
Led migration from monolith to microservices, improving deployment frequency by 400%
Mentored team of 5 developers, establishing code review practices and documentation standards

roles.title: Senior Backend Developer
roles.description: Built core infrastructure for a headless e-commerce platform serving 200+ online stores. Focused on high-availability systems and event-driven architecture.
achievements: Designed event-driven architecture handling 50K+ concurrent users during peak traffic
Implemented multi-tenant data isolation achieving complete security compliance
Built real-time inventory synchronization system reducing overselling incidents by 99%
Established observability practices with Prometheus and Grafana, reducing MTTR by 60%

roles.title: Lead Developer
roles.description: Led development of HIPAA-compliant patient portal serving 100K+ users. Managed a cross-functional team and coordinated with healthcare providers.
achievements: Delivered patient portal that increased online appointment bookings by 40%
Achieved HIPAA compliance certification within 6 months of development start
Integrated with 8 different EHR systems using FHIR standards
Implemented telehealth video consultations seeing 10K+ monthly sessions

roles.title: Full-Stack Developer
roles.description: Developed features for healthcare management applications and internal tools.
achievements: Built insurance claim processing module reducing manual work by 70%
Created automated reporting system for compliance documentation
Improved application performance by implementing lazy loading and code splitting

roles.title: Full-Stack Developer
roles.description: Early-stage startup developing social media management tools. Worked across the entire stack in a fast-paced environment.
achievements: Built social media scheduling API handling 1M+ daily posts
Implemented cross-platform publishing for Twitter, Facebook, LinkedIn, and Instagram
Developed analytics dashboard providing actionable insights for content performance
Created automated rate limit management system maximizing API utilization

roles.title: Junior Developer
roles.description: Started career building web applications for agency clients across various industries.
achievements: Delivered 15+ client projects including e-commerce sites and corporate portals
Learned and applied responsive design principles across all projects
Introduced version control (Git) and improved team collaboration workflows
Built first real estate CRM that became a long-term client product

roles.title: Freelance Developer
roles.description: Freelance web development while completing education. Built small business websites and learned web fundamentals.
achievements: Completed 10+ freelance projects for local businesses
Developed strong client communication and project management skills
Self-taught React and Node.js through real project work
